variants.Description in input context: A mutant form of α-synuclein (A53T) was studied.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using Drosophila melanogaster expressing mutant α-synuclein.

Readout description.Result Description: Neuronal degeneration and synaptic dysfunction were observed in Drosophila expressing the A53T mutant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type α-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal synaptic function with no neuronal degeneration.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant synaptic dysfunction or neuronal degeneration.
